channel.title: Does a rsps work on Vista?
channel.description:
5 people have downloaded my client, and it works fine, however one person who's on Windows Vista has just downloaded it.. and it won't work. Do these run on Vista??
Is there any way to make them run on Vista? :)
Thanks if you can help!!!
I need help fast!!
:)

item.title: Does a rsps work on Vista?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Java has the advantage of being a multi-platform language, i.e. it will run on all platforms for which a Java Virtual Machine is available.

Read full topic
item.source: Does a rsps work on Vista?
